review_title: Not 98% Cotton, as advertised - cheap nylon blend - very unattractive
reviews:
Buyer beware! This is not 98% cotton as advertised. It is some cotton and a whole lot of nylon which gives it a very cheap and unattractive sheen. If you want to look like a fast food worker, get these. The cheap fabric is also very prone to wrinkling.

If these were actually 98% cotton as advertised I would have kept them because the fit was good. But material is critical so these are a big fail.

review_title: Rancid, horrible tasting - do not buy!!
reviews:
Rancid. Horrible tasting and unusable. $40 down the drain.
The hemp version of this is fine. This stuff is not.

review_title: These Work for My Long Haired Cat
reviews: My cat has super fine, super fleecy soft medium to long hair. She has a tendency to get "dreadlocks" around her hindquarters. I used to pay a cat shaver to come and swipe off the knots for $40 a visit. I just spent that on this product, uncertain as to whether it would work. My cat is not a fan of getting shaved - at all. She's a feisty missy. I distracted her with her wet food and while her nose was in her bowl, I started going to work on a large dread at the base of her tail. Because of the low noise she didn't seem to notice much and didn't try to swat at me once. After a few repeatedly swipes, I got the dreadlock off. I was thrilled. She now doesn't have a nasty knot pulling on her sensitive skin and I just saved myself a bunch of money too. I highly recommend these clippers! I can testify that they work for cats. Buy 'em. You won't regret it.

review_title: Shoes are great BUT sizing is off
reviews: I wear a men's size 9 for everything. If I had known these run small I would've sized up a half to a 9.5. Granted they're mostly cloth so they stretch but my big toe bugs out the top of these when I'm running. It's especially noticeable when I'm going downhill. Not sure if my pair was a fluke but if it wasn't for the off sizing I'd give these 5 out of 5. They're light, look sharp and breathe well.

review_title: Perfect for summer!
reviews: Wish it ran a bit longer in the waist area but otherwise, this shirt will be perfect for summer. It's VERY thin to the point of being somewhat see-through. But it's also ridiculously soft. I imagine I'll be wearing this on hot days for sure.

review_title: Warm and classic beanie
reviews: First of all, this is a warm hat. I would save this one for especially cold days. It also makes me feel like a rough n' tumble construction worker because of the Carhartt label on the front. :-) Recommended!

review_title: Great film but this is a poor quality VHS transfer
reviews: I absolutely love this classic noir. But buyer beware! This is not a "Fox Film Noir" noir any other reputable production company. It basically looks like someone burned a copy from a VHS to make this. Now, the quality/transfer isn't terrible. But it's not great. The volume also had to be cranked all the way to the top in order to hear it. So, a bit disappointing in that respect. Try and find the film produced by an actual company and you'll be happier.

review_title: Good for the price!
reviews: I'm using these to watch movies and shows on my iPad and laptop. They're definitely good for the price. They're not very noise-cancelling but they provide a bit of that given they cover the whole ear. I like the fact they also have a volume control and play and pause toggle on the cord. I would recommend these ear phones 100%!

review_title: Great looking pan and easy to clean!
reviews: This pan is super lightweight, I love the green colour and it cleans up nicely and easily every time. The only drawback is that food doesn't taste as good when I make it in this pan. Particularly scrambled eggs. You have to really watch them or they'll get hard fast. But even when you watch 'em like a hawk and they're fluffy scrambled eggs they still don't taste as good as they should. Too bad. Otherwise, I'd rate this 4 or 5 stars.

review_title: At first glance I thought these were kinda cheap-looking
reviews: ... but these are actually really nice fluffy towels! Strongly recommended, especially for the price. They're not THAT big but big enough and most of all, very soft and fluffy and 100% cotton. A pleasure to use. Thanks, Amazon!

review_title: So Soft and Cozy
reviews: Great flannel bottoms. 100% cotton. Roomy in the leg so super comfortable. Drawstring waist if it needs tightening (fits perfect at the waist for me). Haven't washed these yet but given they're quite roomy (fit a bit large) I won't hesitate to throw 'em in the dryer. These keep me warm on winter nights, most importantly. And pockets, of course. Gotta have pockets. All in all, everything you could want in a flannel PJ bottom at a fair price too.

review_title: Soft brushed percale with a good weight to them
reviews: So I was looking at Lacoste cotton percale, Eddie Bauer cotton percale and these, Nautica cotton percale sheets. I didn't end up getting the Lacoste ones but I did get the E. Bauer ones. I would say these Nautica sheets rank highest. The quality seems much more solid than the others. The sheets have a good weight to them, are soft and look super sharp on the bed. These are officially my favourite sheets! They're not super crispy percale because it's a brushed version so more on the soft than crispy side. But, they're still excellent and even though soft and brushed, are not "sticky" when it comes to pet hair. I have a super floofy cat and her hair doesn't stick to these (another reason I prefer percale). They also didn't really shrink at all in the wash and fit my deep mattress perfectly. Highly recommended!

review_title: Nice and thick shower curtain but curiously, mine had an extra hole/rivet
reviews: Great shower curtain. Very mold and mildew resistant thus far. Love that it's clear and that the material is thick. The only odd thing is it came with an extra hole/rivet so I had to double up on the last rung.

review_title: Remastered how exactly??
reviews: Alas, for those desperately seeking a nice clean transfer of a very classic noir, this ain't it. The transfer is just the same as other copies I have of the film (in Film Noir sets). It's grainy, blurry, patchy. Not clear or good. Certainly not remastered. Wonder how they can claim that on that cover?? And so the search continues for an ACTUAL remastered copy of this very fine film noir...

review_title: Calvin Klein knows underwear!
reviews: CK makes the best under things. Be it underwear, undershirts, t-shirts. The best. Cotton and ribbing on these is nice and thick. Fit is long enough for tucking in. The neckline runs a bit low... would prefer it a bit higher but otherwise, perfection.

review_title: Fairly Crisp Percale
reviews: Not the percale of yesteryear but still, pretty good for the price. And the sea planes are super cute looking.

review_title: Great Looking and SUPER Comfortable!
reviews: These shoes are so comfortable I could sleep with them on. Once I put them on I kinda don't wanna take them off. That's how much I like them. They fit well (I have narrow feet, to note) breathe well and look stylish to boot. What more could you want in a shoe? Perfect kicking around slip-on shoes. Highly recommend!!!

review_title: Best cushy cottony socks you can buy
reviews: My goodness I just love these socks. Perfect for a Canadian winter. Cushy and packing a whole lotta cotton! Three cheers!!

review_title: Great looking and super soft and cozy!
reviews:
Really thick, soft and cozy sweat pants that fit great! And one of the only ones that has at least 50% cotton going for it. Seems impossible to find a 100% one out there.
These fit nicely. They‚Äôre long enough. The butt looks good. üòâ the cuffs at the bottom are just right. Pockets are deep. Once you put these on you kinda don‚Äôt want to take them off. That said they are very warm so not ideal for a hot gym - best suited for outdoor runs or doing weights in the gym, that sort of thing.
Highly recommend! Love Champion!

review_title: Would Rather Watch Paint Dry
reviews: This played just fine on my DVD player (I'm in Canada) so no worries there. This isn't the Twilight Zone, however. Every single episode seems the same. Tedious. The special effects are VERY special. I know this is old school sci-fi but it's just not entertaining. The first few episodes were fun but subsequent ones just drag on. Always the same theme. Boring.

review_title: No scent. Not sure if this is original or ...
reviews: No scent. Not sure if this is original or what but couldn't even make out what kind of scent this was supposed to be. Tried it again a week or so later and got a putrid urine-type note. This stuff is gross and I'm selling mine.

review_title: Excellent film noir
reviews: Excellent film noir! Garfield and Winters shine in this. And the transfer is nice and clear and clean (which is important to many of us old movie lovers). Highly recommend! This was Garfield's last major motion picture before his untimely demise, too. No actor played the dumb/cute tough guy better than him.

review_title: These are my favourite underwear, hands down
reviews: These are my favourite underwear, hands down. They fit just right, they are 100% cotton, breathable, and look sharp with the small Jockey tab logo at the top hem. I explored other brands but I'll only be buying these from now on. Worth every penny.

review_title: Unless you like to wear Speedos
reviews: Yikes. This is some ill-fitting underwear. Unless you like to wear Speedos. Tight and loose in all the wrong places. Also the material is rather thick (though it is 100% cotton so that much is good. As others have noted, fits really small. And I'm a small person. They also tend to bunch in the back so you may feel like you're wearing a thong. Unless that's your thing, I really wouldn't recommend these.

review_title: Classic Barbershop Fougere!
reviews: I don't know if this is the original formula from 1934 but damn, this stuff is good. Nice dusky old-fashioned smell. Long lasting too. Highly recommend!

review_title: Poorly written
reviews: There were some helpful bits in this book (mostly the first half) but it was very badly written. Much of it didn‚Äôt apply to my situation either (i.e. abuse by church/religious figures, etc.) I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this one. There are better books out there on the subject.

review_title: Really wanted to like this sweater but the fit is all wrong
reviews: Really wanted to like this sweater but the fit is all wrong. Too short at the waist. Too tight around the neck. The penguin logo is lost on this colour too. That said, the colour is the best thing about it. A beautiful, rich midnight blue.

review_title: My favourite cushy cozy sock ever
reviews: These are the coziest thickest socks and pack a lot of cotton too! My favourite cushy cozy sock ever. Highly recommend!

review_title: Badly sewn cloth ‚Äúbags‚Äù for your feet anyone?
reviews: These ‚Äúshoes‚Äù are like badly sewn up burlap feed sacks for your feet. They are not attractive whatsoever. All they have going for them is that they are comfortable and light. They also don‚Äôt breathe well and appear to suit those with wider feet. Would never buy this brand again. I‚Äôm only using them to do laundry in and to do stuff in and around my building. I‚Äôd be too embarrassed to venture in these. I thought the rough/homemade look could look cool. It doesn‚Äôt. It just looks crappy.

review_title: Good fit and material
reviews: Good fit and material, however, the t-shirts were held to their packaging with tape. Tape residue hasn't come off in the wash. Hoping after more washes it will come off but kind of a shame as only 1 of the 3 t-shirts is actually looking new and healthy. I flagged this to the seller. Hopefully they can fix that for others.

review_title: Highly recommend this product
reviews: This stuff works!!! Helps me sleep through the night and the next day I feel bright and refreshed (and I can feel the anti-depressant and anti-anxiety effects the next day as well - bonus). It is particularly helpful for hormone-induced insomnia. I get sleepless in and around my period and it really seems to help with that. Highly recommend this product!

review_title: GREAT movie. Too bad the transfer/film quality wasn't better
reviews: GREAT movie. Too bad the transfer/film quality wasn't better. They need to re-do this one and give it the viewing pleasure it deserves. Susan Hayward was awesome in this.

review_title: Two Stars
reviews: Terrible transfer: choppy, snowy, blurry. Movie itself is pretty appalling too. Save your money. Don't buy this.

review_title: Terrible for anyone with pets
reviews: "Sticky" fabric. Terrible for anyone with pets. Also runs really thin and the zipper sticks often. Seems cheap. Not recommended.

review_title: What you see is NOT what you get
reviews: Shipped directly from China. Bad transfer. Graphics are faded as if left in the sun for a year. Cheap hard plastic that literally only covers the back, not the top and bottom. Useless really. NOT recommended.

review_title: Five Stars
reviews: Excellent film noir. Gritty and risque for its time, I believe. Highly recommended!

review_title: Read this as a teen and loved it but as an adult - not so much
reviews: Gorgeous writing but I found it a struggle to get through. Read this as a teen and loved it but as an adult - not so much. Not sure what that says about it... ;-)

review_title: Perfect "girly" noir
reviews: Perfect "girly" noir. If you're a dude and you want to win your gal over to the "noir side" this little gem of a film could just win her over to the genre. Loved the supporting girl cast to Baxter... They shone. A highly recommended noir though not typical. Also, a decent transfer/copy. I particularly enjoyed the sets (the girls' apartment, the cafe, Raymond Burr's MCM swag apartment to name but a few).

review_title: All nice clean transfers/copies of some of Joan's best work
reviews: All nice clean transfers/copies of some of Joan's best work. Each film included here is classic Crawford all the way. Highly recommended set!

review_title: Excellent film noir
reviews: Excellent film noir. Great camera angles/shots, nice clean transfer. Great story and some excellent performances. Loved all the supporting "thug" characters. All very memorable. Highly recommend this classic noir.
